homepage.heroSubtitle: Accenvix Solutions empowers individuals and organizations with professional training, business consulting, and technology-enabled learning services. We bridge the gap between skills development and practical business application.
homepage.comprehensiveSolutions: Comprehensive tech solutions tailored to your business needs.
homepage.exploreSuccessStories: Explore some of our recent success stories and innovative solutions.
homepage.readyToStart: Ready to Start Your Next Project?
homepage.discussTransform: Let's discuss how Accenvix Solutions can help transform your ideas into reality. Get in touch today for a free consultation.

about.pageSubtitle: Empowering businesses with innovative IT solutions and professional consulting services.
about.teamSubtitle: The talented people behind Accenvix Solutions.
about.storyContent1: Founded in 2025, Accenvix Solutions is a professional services firm focused on capacity building, business transformation, and learning innovation. We bridge the gap between skills development, technology enablement, and practical business application.
about.storyContent2: Based in Johor Bahru, Malaysia, we're supported by a leadership and consulting team with more than 15 years of combined experience across Information Technology (IT), business and financial consulting, and learning development.
about.storyContent3: By combining strategic thinking, practical execution, and technology-enabled learning, we deliver integrated solutions that support professional services excellence, talent sustainability, and long-term business performance.
about.storyContent4: Our commitment extends beyond individual projects to building enduring relationships that support continuous improvement and sustained competitive advantage.
about.missionContent: Accenvix Solutions is committed to delivering high-quality, industry-aligned training and consulting services that enhance professional services performance through continuous skills transformation and digital adoption.
about.missionContent2: We empower individuals with practical, relevant, and applicable knowledge while building long-term partnerships grounded in trust, professionalism, and measurable outcomes.
about.visionContent: To be a trusted strategic partner in professional training, business consulting, and technology-enabled learning, recognised for quality, integrity, and long-term impact.
about.valuesDescription: The principles that guide everything we do.
about.excellenceDesc: Uncompromising quality standards and structured delivery methodologies ensure consistently exceptional outcomes.
about.innovationDesc: Embracing new technologies and creative solutions to solve complex business challenges.
about.integrityDesc: Operating with the highest standards of professional conduct and corporate responsibility.
about.collaborationDesc: Building strategic partnerships with leading experts, certified trainers, and trusted partners.
about.trustDesc: Building enduring relationships grounded in professionalism and measurable outcomes.
about.growthDesc: Enabling sustainable and measurable growth through skills transformation and digital adoption.

services.pageSubtitle: Comprehensive professional services from Accenvix Solutions tailored to meet your unique business needs and drive sustainable growth through capacity building and digital transformation.
services.businessConsultingDesc: Strategic planning, operational excellence, and cost optimization solutions for sustainable growth.
businessConsultingFeatures: ISO System Support (development, review, and audit services)
Operational excellence and cost efficiency improvement
Financial planning, performance analysis, and cost optimisation
services.professionalTrainingDesc: Comprehensive training programs designed to address professional services skill gaps.
services.itDigitalDesc: Technology advisory and implementation coordination for digital workflow automation.
itDigitalFeatures: Web App, Mobile App, API development
services.learningSupportDesc: Academic tutoring, coaching, and structured learning pathways for students and individuals, including custom school management solutions.
learningSupportFeatures: Learning Management System (LMS) advisory and implementation
Skills-based learning pathways for students and individuals
Custom educational technology solutions (e.g., EduSync School Management System)
services.itServicesDesc: Explore our comprehensive range of IT services including web development, cloud solutions, enterprise software, and digital transformation.
services.customSolutionDesc: We understand that every business is unique. Let's discuss your specific requirements and create a tailored solution that fits your needs perfectly.

itServices.pageSubtitle: Comprehensive IT services designed to accelerate your digital transformation. From custom software development to cloud infrastructure, we deliver innovative solutions that power your business growth.
itServices.technologiesDesc: We leverage industry-leading technologies to build robust, scalable, and future-proof solutions.
itServices.servicesDesc: End-to-end technology solutions tailored to your business needs
itServices.webDevelopmentDesc: Custom web applications built with modern frameworks and best practices for optimal performance.
itServices.mobileAppsDesc: Native and cross-platform mobile applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.
itServices.cloudSolutionsDesc: Scalable cloud infrastructure and deployment solutions for modern businesses.
itServices.enterpriseSoftwareDesc: Custom enterprise solutions that streamline operations and improve productivity.
itServices.digitalTransformationDesc: Strategic digital solutions that modernize your business processes and operations.
itServices.cybersecurityDesc: Comprehensive security solutions to protect your digital assets and infrastructure.
itServices.processDesc: A proven methodology that ensures successful project delivery
itServices.discoveryDesc: Understanding your requirements, goals, and challenges
itServices.planningDesc: Creating detailed project roadmap and technical architecture
itServices.developmentDesc: Agile development with regular updates and iterations
itServices.whyChooseUsDesc: We deliver technology solutions that drive real business value
itServices.technicalExpertiseDesc: Our team consists of certified professionals with deep expertise in modern technologies.
itServices.securityFirstDesc: We implement robust security measures to protect your business from evolving threats.
itServices.rapidDeliveryDesc: Our efficient processes ensure fast time-to-market without compromising quality.
itServices.measurableResultsDesc: We focus on delivering tangible outcomes that impact your bottom line.
itServices.freeConsultationDesc: Get a no-obligation assessment of your IT requirements.
itServices.ctaDesc: Let's discuss how our IT expertise can help you achieve your business goals.

portfolio.pageSubtitle: Explore our recent projects from Accenvix Solutions and see how we've helped businesses, government organizations, and individual learners achieve their professional development goals.
portfolio.EduSyncLearningPlatformDesc: Interactive online learning platform with video streaming, quizzes, and progress tracking.
portfolio.eCommercePlatformDesc: A full-featured e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management, payment integration, and analytics dashboard.
portfolio.healthcareManagementDesc: Comprehensive healthcare management system for patient records, appointments, and billing automation.
portfolio.fintechMobileAppDesc: Cross-platform mobile banking app with biometric authentication and real-time transaction tracking.
portfolio.logisticsDashboardDesc: Real-time logistics tracking dashboard with route optimization and delivery management features.
portfolio.iotDashboardDesc: Industrial IoT monitoring dashboard for real-time sensor data visualization and predictive maintenance.
portfolio.wantToSeeProject: Want to See Your Project Here?
portfolio.wantToSeeProjectDesc: Whether you're a corporate enterprise, government organization, or individual learner, we're ready to help you achieve your professional development goals. Contact us to discuss your next project.

contact.pageSubtitle: Ready to start your next project with Accenvix Solutions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible to discuss how we can help transform your ideas into reality.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your project or ask us a question...

privacy.pageSubtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

informationCollection.title: Information Collection
informationCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us when you use our services, contact us, or interact with our website. This may include your name, email address, phone number, company information, and any other information you choose to provide.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect to:
howWeUse.point1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
howWeUse.point2: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
howWeUse.point3: Send you administrative information and newsletters
howWeUse.point4: Analyze trends and usage patterns to improve our services
howWeUse.point5: Comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. Cookies are used to improve your browsing experience, remember your preferences, and analyze website performance.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage.

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParties.content: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
rights.point1: The right to access your personal data
rights.point2: The right to rectify inaccurate personal data
rights.point3: The right to erase your personal data
rights.point4: The right to restrict processing of your personal data

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the effective date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

terms.pageSubtitle: These terms govern your use of our website and services. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using the Accenvix Solutions website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

services.title: Services
services.content: Accenvix Solutions provides professional training, business consulting, and digital transformation services. While we strive to provide accurate and reliable information, we do not guarantee the completeness, accuracy, or reliability of any content on our website.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Accenvix Solutions or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or otherwise use any content without our prior written consent.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: When using our website and services, you agree not to:
userResponsibilities.point1: Use the website for any unlawful purpose
userResponsibilities.point2: Transmit any harmful, threatening, or offensive material
userResponsibilities.point3: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
userResponsibilities.point4: Interfere with the proper functioning of our website

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Accenvix Solutions shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of your use of our website or services. Your sole remedy for dissatisfaction with our services is to discontinue use.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. These links are provided for your convenience only. We do not endorse and are not responsible for the content or practices of any third-party websites.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our website and services at any time, without notice, for any reason, including but not limited to violation of these Terms of Service.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Malaysia, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms of Service on this page and updating the effective date.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
